column4: hey people. On a standard ubuntu install, are users able to boot grub into single user mode and change the root password without knowing it first?
i found the clamav on the repos refused to update definitoins and had to compile the source for the latest from the clamav site
if it doesnt update you may have to compile it
freshclam only updates the virus definitions, not the program itself
but you are relying on the repo maintainers to update them
so there is no other ubuntu repository that provides 0.94.1?
wise to ask, buy whats compatible and you save a TONNE of grief
ok, yeah that is a complete list of supported hardware, but is there no recommendation for a specific chipset?
cups as in the print server? It has an app to draw that type of pictures?
i am not clear what you are after
many apps have web UIs, Transmission and many other torrent clients have them
